title: Nextalk
tag: A real-time chat application designed to facilitate seamless and instant communication. Built with a focus on user experience and reliability.
description: This is a chat application I developed as my capstone project for my ALX software engineering certification. NexTalk enables real-time communication using Socket.IO and includes key features such as user authentication, file uploads, new message notifications, and online/offline status tracking. After presenting the project, I decided to continue working on it and am currently in the process of adding new features.
